home.about.title: Welcome to Nikahang
home.about.text: We are dedicated to fostering talent, nurturing creativity, and making music accessible to individuals of all ages and skill levels. Our esteemed faculty, comprising industry experts and accomplished musicians, offer personalized instruction across a spectrum of instruments and genres. Join us at the Harmonic Rhapsody to celebrate the transformative power of music and embark on your unique musical journey.
home.instrument.title: Musical Instruments
home.instrument.subtitle: OUR CLASSES
home.instrument.piano.name: Piano
home.instrument.piano.description: Versatile instrument producing melodic harmonies with expressive dynamics.
home.instrument.guitar.name: Guitar
home.instrument.guitar.description: Popular stringed instrument for rhythmic and melodic accompaniment.
home.instrument.setar.name: Setar
home.instrument.setar.description: Traditional Persian instrument with delicate and soulful sounds.
home.instrument.violin.name: Violin
home.instrument.violin.description: Elegant bowed instrument conveying emotional melodies with rich timbre.
home.instrument.dulcimer.name: Dulcimer
home.instrument.dulcimer.description: Melodic percussive instrument creating resonant and folk-inspired tunes.
home.instrument.singing.name: Singing
home.instrument.singing.description: Vocal art form expressing emotions through melodic storytelling.
